{{Infobox Underground Item |name = Fossilized Drake |image = [[File:Fossilized Drake.png|200px]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Fossilized Drake''. |location =
*[[Underground]] *[[Berry Master]] }} ==Description== The '''Fossilized Drake''' is a type of [[Fossils|Fossil]]. ==Details== It can be used alongside [[File:Fossilized Bird.png|30px]] [[Fossilized Bird]] and [[File:Fossilized Fish.png|30px]] [[Fossilized Fish]] at the Fossil Master to purchase Dracozolt and Dracovish, respectively. ==Mine Layout== The Fossilized Drake appears in the Underground as a 3x4 sized object.

[[File:FossilizedDrakeMine.png|100px]] ==Uses== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: center;" |- ! Fossil !! Pok√©mon !! Cost |- | [[File:Fossilized Bird.png|30px]]
[[File:Fossilized Drake.png|30px]] || [[File:Dracozolt.png|40px]] Dracozolt || 25,000 {{Questpoints}} |- | [[File:Fossilized Fish.png|30px]]
[[File:Fossilized Drake.png|30px]] || [[File:Dracovish.png|40px]] Dracovish || 25,000 {{Questpoints}} |} ==Acquisition== Fossilized Drake can be found in the [[Underground]] and traded for with the [[Berry Master|Hoenn Berry Master]].
{{Underground Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Fossils]] __NOTOC__
